page.title: 06The Orchid Nurseries
page.content:
The Trinity Orchid Nurseries have been going for about a year. Previously it was a private collection but{Eric Young}bought it to enable people to study these beautiful, rare plants.
The Nurseries consist of about nine acres of field and woodland. In half an acre of{glasshouses}are one hundred thousand plants and flowers, all in special beds. Some of the orchids like hot conditions while others prefer the wet. Rain water is used to water the plants and about one hundred thousand gallons of water are stored in the Nurseries' own reservoir. The Nurseries are being{opened to the {public}in the Autumn and a 'new ruin' has been built to add to the attraction.
